channel.title: Portfolio on Julio Alvarez
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Julio Alvarez

item.title: Study Of RomneyCare concerning abortions
item.description: The sensitive topics of abortion and health care coverage are among the most common policy relevant debates in the United States. Using difference-in-differences regression analysis, we analyze the effect of the Massachusetts Health Care Reform (otherwise known as RomneyCare) on the abortion rate of Massachusetts. We use the state of Rhode Island as a counterfactual state for its similarities to Massachusetts in demographics and in underlying trends. We perform regressions using CDC data on the percentage of uninsured individuals and the abortion rate.

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Guide to moving abroad
item.description: Passports ready? Here’s a list of things you might want to consider as you prepare for the big move. This list is by no means comprehensive, there might be some things that specifically apply to you and that are relevant to your country of origin or destiantion. Visit and Spend time with family. Moving abroad means that your extended family will be less accesible than before. Spend time with family, take into account those with chronic illnesses who are more suceptible to health breakdowns.
